properties.title: Cheese factory Gottardo
properties.abstract: At the foot of the San Gottardo massive, the Caseificio Dimostrativo del Gottardo represents a great chance of contact and an excellent meeting point. It's a structure, which dairy production is accompanied by other activities.
properties.description: Coming from the north, Airolo is the first village in Ticino. The surrounding countryside is a place for countless excursions. Ticino has a long tradition of cheese-making. The large variety of alpine herbs growing in the alpine pastures gives the cheese a particular aromatic flavor. The Gotthard cheese dairy in Airolo, produces 3 prestigious cheese pastes, but also ice cream, yogurt, butter, etc. from the milk of the cows in the Gotthard region. These products can be directly purchased at the diaryâ€™s shop or savored at the restaurant. The dairy offers the opportunity to see how products are made, with a guided tour of the establishment (upon reservation), and with an exhibit on traditional methods of Swiss cheese-making. Visitors also have the exclusive opportunity to make their own cheese using the milk produced by the local cows. Moreover, after 3 months of aging the cheese can be sent home (within Europe) as a nice souvenir from Ticino.
